actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase the dollar amount of the resources which an individual or couple may have and still be eligible for SSI benefits, and to provide for periodic cost-of-living increases in such dollar amount.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to: (1) increase the amount of income an individual or couple may receive and still qualify for SSI benefits; and (2) provide for periodic cost-of-living increases.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase the dollar amount of the resources which an individual or couple may have and still be eligible for SSI benefits, and to provide for periodic cost-of-living increases in such dollar amount.
